title: Cholesterol Lowering Diet: Lower Cholesterol with Paleo Recipes and Low Carb
features: Cholesterol Lowering Diet: Lower Cholesterol with Paleo Recipes and Low Carb
The Cholesterol Lowering Diet book features
two different yet very similar diet plans
Each diet is geared to be low carb and
offers great benefits to those who need help in lowering their cholesterol
through diet. The first line of action a healthcare provider will suggest for a patient with high cholesterol levels is to
. Many will suggest steering clear of high carbs and eating healthy whole foods from lean meats and fresh fruits and vegetables.
These very foods are featured in both the low carb diet and the Paleolithic diet.
. Low carb foods naturally help the body to lower cholesterol and maintain proper cholesterol levels.
description: Co author of "Cholesterol Lowering Diet: Lower Cholesterol with Paleo Recipes and Low Carb".
